Type.Name: BuildChildrenFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void BuildChildrenFunc(Glade.XML xml, Gtk.Widget parent, Glade.WidgetInfo info);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.remarks: this delegate is used for custom methods to built the internal children of a widget.
